posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobb Bat On Shoulder PSA 2(MC) - AMAZING eye appeal - SOLD
posts.post_content:
I am helping sell a collection for a friend. His father left him an amazing collection of cards, with this being the first batch what will prove to be many submissions of cards that get sold. I voluntered to help and use my name, as I have sold on here and elsewhere for years. I have a flawless track record, and work under the same user name on multipl platforms and EBAY. I have every card being posted in hand as we speak. I will be the person shipping everything sold via USPS registered mail fully insured. Let me know what questions you have. All payments via need to be via Paypal.

Cobb PSA 2(MC) - $SOLD
